title: albert0bsd
author: albert0bsd
created_time: August 20, 2023, 01:33:28 AMLast edit: August 20, 2023, 01:58:13 PM by albert0bsd
content: A few weeks ago, I presented a puzzle within this forum and shared it on my Telegram channel as well. You can find the original post here. The previous puzzle garnered enthusiastic participants and winners. In the spirit of challenging exploration.I'm glad to introduce another puzzle. While it has been unveiled on Telegram, the solution remains undisclosed. My intention is to reveal it here, sparking curiosity and engagement.The puzzle consist in three signatures i hope some of you enjoy it, in this occasion there is not digital prize, but the learning process may be funPuzzles:Code:-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Message 1K1 = 3*K2 + 1337-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----1HACKME1KfbBGkVjaEdwbNUKopj8BkzgwKHxxjx0w2WIKZZgvJJsWcBORuavJTn1oaec6EIrrGF6nC7f3j/kZjao3vIiH7LRlTt/3s4bkMQ+EQYbgAfErTN4U=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----Code:-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Message 2Lost coins only make everyone else's coins worth slightly more. Think of it as a donation to everyone.-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----1HACKME1KfbBGkVjaEdwbNUKopj8BkzgwKIBQ52JRhevsS6fr6lCcJm0j1Iw0jbmFtTTT/9OPxOXjq/O6jbJRvjPlxOgIfQBz8famh3VPJ7UC9dy31TlXmJMQ=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----Code:-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNED MESSAGE-----Here is a new puzzle with two steps1.- The Goal is to generate a valid signature with this same address.2.- You need to find the double link to be invited into a private group.Hints:For step 1- Check how my previous puzzle was create- It is just math, all you need is algebra and a custom arithmetic- Look for any hidden message to be able to access to Step 2For step 2- Information can be represented in a wide variety of formats- Every composite number can be factorize in two or more prime numbers- Each bit count- Try to think outside the box or visualize the bigger picture.-----BEGIN BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----1HACKME1KfbBGkVjaEdwbNUKopj8BkzgwKH9ioa0YR0Ineb2Vbqd+zmbZ4ypv5W7EfEfTrxEY/1R7HsajPyUDod96m1LqVCaOAWzYqf/87jayXjQXR3dqEFqI=-----END BITCOIN SIGNATURE-----Embark on this cerebral journey and see where your wit and insight lead you. The interplay of cryptography and mathematical finesse awaits your exploration. Happy puzzling!Current solvers:https://t.me/keyhunters/31752https://t.me/keyhunters/31675

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: Quote from: ripemdhash on August 20, 2023, 10:47:22 AMcould you add some btc ?Hi, sorry as i mentionen in the telegram group, by the moment i can't sponsor some balance for this puzzle, but it still worth a spot in some private group were we discust interesting things..Maybe in the future i can do more puzzles with prizes in it..Regards!

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Illuminati confirmed, secretly held private group in telegram!I am busy at the moment ( honestly I have no knowledge about signatures ) so I might solve it later.ðŸ˜…QuoteLost coins only make everyone else's coins worth slightly more. Think of it as a donation to everyone.I guess that's why Satoshi never touched his first million bitcoins, it's a donation to everyone!
